events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position, including their resume and cover letter.
The application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster based on keywords such as software developer and engineer in the resume.
A recruiter specializing in technical roles has been assigned to the candidate to move forward with the hiring process.
Conducted the initial screening call where the candidate demonstrated strong knowledge of software development principles and experience.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm for continuing with the technical interview stage.
The technical interview has been scheduled for next week to evaluate the candidate's coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
